Microbiotic Biodonatum

Enjoy Biodonatum as an important part of a balanced and varied diet, a healthy lifestyle and active longevity.

Biodonatum – Don’t hide your age – change it!

  • Supports the diversity of your unique gut microbiota.
  • Special combination of scientifically tested 16 strains of bacteria.
  • Does not contain animal proteins, gluten, yeast or lactose.
  • Does not contain artificial colors or flavors.
  • Suitable for people with dairy allergies.
  • Improved digestion.

Листайте влево/вправо

70% of the immune system is located in our gut, making it the largest immune organ in our body. The small intestine contains approximately 100 million neurons, second only to the brain in quantity, and produces 95% of the body's total serotonin, known as the "Happiness Transmitter."

Recent scientific studies highlight the close relationship between gut health and overall well-being. As awareness of gut health increases, we recognize the importance of maintaining a balanced gut environment for a healthier life.

Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium, naturally inhabiting our gut, play a crucial role in producing beneficial postbiotic substances that enhance health. Our gut hosts around one hundred trillion bacteria, and it is essential that beneficial bacteria like Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium remain active to produce ample amounts of these vital postbiotic compounds. However, factors such as mental stress, poor diet, insomnia, and aging negatively impact their environment, reducing their ability to generate postbiotics effectively.

To combat these challenges, we have developed advanced fermentation technology and honed our expertise to create Biodonatum PURE, a next-generation postbiotic supplement designed to support and enhance gut health naturally.

Biodonatum PURE is formulated with a unique blend of Lactic Acid Bacteria (LAB) fermented metabolites, obtained through a proprietary 2-year fermentation process. This results in a bioactive supplement that supports digestive balance, strengthens the immune system, and enhances overall well-being.

Biodonatum Pure has 465 micronutrients to maintain and improve your health life.

Biodonatum PURE is 100% natural, bioavailable, and suitable for daily use, ensuring long-term gut health maintenance. It is free from artificial additives, preservatives, gluten, dairy, yeast, and animal proteins, making it a safe and effective choice for individuals of all ages, including vegetarians.

Our proprietary multi-step fermentation process produces a complex range of immune-supporting compounds, including proteins, polyphenols, vitamins, minerals, amino acids, polysaccharides, and fiber. These components nourish the body’s immune system, enhance resistance to harmful microorganisms, and contribute to overall wellness.

By integrating Biodonatum PURE into your daily routine, you are taking a proactive step towards optimal gut health, improved digestion, and a stronger immune system.

100% Metabolite Composition & Maximum Effectiveness

Biodonatum PURE is a next-generation postbiotic supplement designed to support the balance and vitality of your unique microbiome. Its bioactive metabolites nourish the gut, protect against harmful bacteria and viruses, and enhance overall digestive and immune health.

Therapeutic indications Biodonatum PURE is used for:

  • the prevention and treatment of intestinal disorders related to the alteration in intestinal flora, that manifest themselves as diarrhea, abdominal pain and increase of air in the bowel (intestinal dismicrobisme), constipation, vitamin deficiencies in the body resulting from the imbalance of intestinal flora (endosageous avitaminosis);
  • coadjuvant treatment to restore intestinal microbial flora altered during treatment with antibiotics or chemotherapy;
  • the treatment of acute and chronic gastro-intestinal diseases of infants caused by poisoning or alteration of the normal balance of intestinal bacterial flora, that manifest themselves as diarrhea, abdominal pain and increase of air in the bowel (intestinal dismicrobisme), constipation or vitamin deficiencies in the organism (avitaminosis).

Suggested Usage:

Adults: Take 5 to 10 ml daily, with or without water.
Before meals for optimal absorption.
30 minutes before antibiotics to support gut balance.
30 minutes before chemotherapy and 1 hour after chemotherapy for microbiome restoration.
15 minutes before other medications to enhance gut flora function.
Children: Take 15 drops daily, diluted in water or juice.

Pleasant natural taste, suitable for all age groups.

Active ingredients: Lactic Acid Bacteria (LAB) fermented metabolites by mixed culture of 31 Lactobacillus species: Bifidobacterium longum (2 strains), Bifidobacterium adolescentis (2strains), Bifidobacterium bifidum (1 strain), Bifidobacterium breve (1 strain), Bifidobacterium infantis (1 strain), Enterococcus faecium (5 strains), Enterococcus faecalis (1 strain), Enterococcus durans (3 strains), Lactobacillus ss casei (2 strains), Lactobacillus bulgaricus (1 strain), Lactobacillus lactis (1 strain), Lactobacillus casei (4 strains), Lactobacillus brevis (1 strain), Lactobacillus acidophilus (3 strains), Lactobacillus gasseri (2 strains), Lactobacillus delbrueckii (1 strain)-145,2g, Citric acid-2,25g, Malic acid-2,25g, Stevia-0,3g.

The original composition of BIODONATUM PURE is the result of a unique manufacturing process. The production cycle of LAB fermented metabolites lasts 24 months and is entirely organic.

Nutrition Facts (per 150ml)
Energy 27 Kcal
Proteins 0,9 g
Fat 0,15g
Carbohydrates 6,0g
Sodium 18,9g
Ash 1,05g

Biodonatum PURE delivers 31 strains of beneficial bacteria, each with specific health benefits.
With 465 bioactive metabolites, it restores gut health, boosts immunity, and promotes overall well-being.

This probiotic is demonstrably capable of reducing leaky gut issues and allergies. Within the past two years, I had my microbiome tested in a top-notch lab in Germany (BioVis) for the purpose of assessing the state of my gut, ranging from general microbiome composition, presence of pathogens, inflammatory markers, zonulin, and many others. Taking this product has had a positive influence on me.
